statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 21 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
